trans-unit.source: Allplan extended version of Original tast! This task updates the ke_search index. But you can have more than one Sheduler Task with options
The period has to be an integer and greater than zero or -1 (means endless) .
Select the Language you want to set for all Entries found by this indexer (default empty)
external URL for Indexer if needed ( f.e. help.allplan.com/.../ )
Overwrite Storage Page ID with this PageUid (leave empt or enter only an INT
You have to select at least one Indexer Configuration.
The Indexer Configuration(s) %s does not exist.
Storage Pid should be empty OR an int Value ( Page ID or the Sysfolder where you want to store the indexer Entries.
